mdRecord.dcterms:title: Map showing location of coal operations, railroad extensions, and developments in the counties of Putnam, Kanawha, Fayette, Nicholas, Clay, and Braxton, state of West Virginia, 1895 / Prepared for Mine Inspector's Report by Houghton A. Robson, State Mine Inspector, Third District ; Office of Louis W. Atkinson, Thurmond, W. Va. ; Thomas Nichol, Delineator
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Robson, Houghton A. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: West Virginia. Office of the Chief Mine Inspector. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Contains a numerical key to the "List of operators." [original]
Includes 2 cross-sections: On Hughes Creek, O.A. Veasey, C.E. -- Section opposite Coalburg, C.C. Lewis. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: From the Papers of the Anderson Family, MSS 38-96. [original]
